description: With al-Taftāzānīʼs gloss on the margins; ff. 248. 302 x 209; 202 x 109 mm. 31 lin. 1070 H., Ṣāliḥ ibn al-Mahdī al-Muqbilī. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 372 (commentary 3); S I, 537. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى بدأ الانام ... قال وىنحصر ... اقول ىنحصر المختصر او العلم
author: Ījī, ʻAḍud al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad, d. 1355?
title: Sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá.
creator: Ījī, ʻAḍud al-Dīn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad, d. 1355?
subject: Ibn al-ḥājib, ʻUthmān ibn ʻUmar, 1175-1249—Mukhtaṣar al-Muntahá.
